entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Developers should be able to use System.Text.Json in Native AOT seamlessly #79122
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: COM source generator APIs #79121
    8.0.0
  • AccessViolationException using System.Numerics.Vector3 #79118
    8.0.0
  • Benchmark data missed when `apt-get` fails to obtain a lock on `dotnet-runtime-perf` #79117
  • RegexOptions.NonBacktracking producing wrong matches with loops and contextual nullability #79116
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.ChunkBy #79111
  • RegexOptions.NonBacktracking missing matches with certain alternations involving non-nullable prefixes #79110
  • Remove hardcoded TFM in wasm build files #79109
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Serialize does not correctly serialize classes that inherit from List<T> #79106
  • Roslyn analyzers for bug-prone usage of DateTime/DateTimeOffset #79105
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerTests.CallFunctionOnTests.InvalidPropertyGetters` timed out on rolling builds #79100
    8.0.0
  • AssemblyLoadContext not unloading #79094
  • .NET 7 WCF Client throws exception deserializing response from .NET Framework 4.7.2 WCF Server when the response has a double with a decimal point #79092
  • [QUERY] Issue Implementing High Performance Logger when switching to .net6.0 #79087
    Future
  • [workloads] Add prerelease version to workload manifest location #79086
    8.0.0
  • JIT doesn't fold typeof(_Canon) == typeof(vt) #79081
    8.0.0
  • [Blazor WASM VS 2022 ] Breakpoints not being hit in Visual Studio #79078
  • FileVersionInfo.FileVersion abnormal for C:\system32\notepad.exe #79077
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_StreamWriter #79099
  • Regression in IfStatements.IfStatements #79101
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CreateAddAndClear<Int32> #79102
  • SslStream does not have Read override with Span #79072
  • ByRef-like structs can be passed via __arglist but not retrieved #79065
  • CGroup/Docker memory reservation model isn't honored by GC #79063
    8.0.0
  • Consider aging dependent handles the same way as the other kinds of handles. #79062
    Future

Closed

  • Unable to break execution. The debugger is unable to stop this process as no CLR has been loaded for self contained and publish ready to run WPF app #78507
    Future
  • Testing System.DateTime area label #79115
  • Testing System.IO.Hashing area label #79114
  • Testing System.DateTime area label #79112
  • Broken DirectorySearch DirectorySynchronization #79066
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions #77910
    8.0.0
  • Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/interp/transform.c:2072, condition `<disabled>' not met #79089
  • CI build failure: Build MacCatalyst x64 Release AllSubsets_Mono - XcodeBuildApp task failed unexpectedly - Could not find System.Runtime.Tests.app #78778
    8.0.0
  • TaskScheduler.UnobservedTaskException event and value tasks #79064
  • Typo in PipeOptions comment #79080
  • Qustion: How does TryParse decide what to return when there are multiple matching values: #78985
    Future
  • Error in InterpolatedStringHandlerArgumentAttribute summary #79068
  • Want remove more boundary checks in loops #79075
  • Public TextFieldParser.Dispose() missing in .NET 5/6/7 #79083
  • Does MAUI not trust Android user-added root CAs? #79041
    8.0.0
  • MissingMethodException when modify record in solution with mixed TFMs #79082
  • AggressiveInlining not respected when Method grow too large #41692
    8.0.0
  • JIT code optimization inconsistency #51587
    8.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Vector: Recognize division by a constant and inline #43761
    8.0.0
  • Casting via generic math doesn't always inline as expected #78648
    8.0.0
  • `Interop.CheckedAccess.cs` is unused #78328
    Future
  • ILCompiler --make-repro-path option is not working in .net8 #78921
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add [Generated] attribute to source-generated code #79067
  • [metadata-update] Add support for deltas with CustomAttributes modifications #52993
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove staged build param #79119
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Added byref to native int CAST on import #79113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold typeof(vt) relop typeof(_Canon) #79108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use the new DateTimeOffset.TotalOffsetMinutes API #79107
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix PROFILE_INTERP option #79104
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0] Workaround MacCatalyst .app output path change in cmake 3.25 #79098
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] Workaround MacCatalyst .app output path change in cmake 3.25 #79097
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull and ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf in more places #79096
    area-Meta
  • Fix creating incorrect options in the repro package #79095
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Simplify Task.FromResult #79091
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [release/7.0] Bump 6.0 workload #79085
    7.0.x
  • [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #79076
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Wait for serverTask before asserting IsCompletedSuccessfully #79071
    area-System.IO

Merged

  • ArgOutOfRangeException throw helpers #78222
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Delete .NET Native leftovers from type loader (part 2 of X) #79073
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix `IMetaDataImport::GetCustomAttributeByName` generic attributes #79103
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Allow inlining in some over-bugdet cases #78874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix boundary handling in Regex auto-atomicity optimization #79088
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Factoring out same if condition #79070
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Put back setting of field in DirectorySearcher.FindAll #79093
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Workaround MacCatalyst .app output path change in cmake 3.25 #79084
  • Remove file with unused APIs. #79074
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Simplify `impAssignStruct[Ptr]` and `gtNewBlkOpNode` #78252
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix comment typo in PipeOptions.cs #79090
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Fix null vs empty string in InterpolatedStringHandlerArgumentAttribute XML comments #79069
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Fold some HW nodes for constant input #78929
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support GT_SELECT on xarch #78879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix repro package creation #78924
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [hot_reload] Enable some CustomAttributes tests on Mono; new issue for async #79044
    area-EnC-mono

Updated

  • Implement a heuristic for using fast-path serialization in streaming JsonSerializer methods. #78646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add mechanism for runtime to query host for information #78798
    area-Host
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [Release/7.0] Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource (#78213) #79009
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2058376 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Unify BufferedFileStreamStrategy seeking #78984
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Increase size of Number's small numbers cache, and make it lazy #79061
  • Remove FILEDosToUnixPathA conversion #78995
    breaking-change, area-PAL-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • CoreCLR initialization failures logging #78790
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in the RegexCompiler and source gen #78927
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Hashing
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey and List copy to Array #78737
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update a few dependencies #79036
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.14
  • Disallow `IND<struct>` except as a source of `STORE_DYN_BLK` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve "one asg morphing" and move it to `morphblock.cpp` #79037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove getFieldAddress #79060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remaining feedback part1 #79011
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Split #79048
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [draft][wasm] Memory snapshot #78915
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 3 #78782
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0] Move AT_EXECFN to fallback for /proc/self/exe #79057
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 7.0.x
  • Enable loading COM component in default ALC via runtime config setting #79026
    area-Host

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-01
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

    area-green-threads

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scripts breaking after upgrade to .NET 7 due to missing classes from System.Security.Cryptography #29325

Closed

  • dotnet sdk disappeared but still shows it installed on linux fedora 37 and dotnet 6.0.11 #29335
  • dotnet test does not pass arguments to msbuild when a path to a project is provided #29309
  • Slow design-time builds for large solution #27738
    7.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip one of the AllCommonItemsCreate test cases #29345
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29341
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update razor-compiler dependencies #29322
    Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • Do not copy dotnet-watch to Redist in redist.csproj #29343
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2057963 #29319
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29314
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29313
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the short name of NUnit Playwright in approvals #29326
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update the correct nuget.config file and remove a bunch of extra sources #29288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29158
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29018
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet nuget commands show correct help text #29266
    Area-CLI
  • Add base class for all test classes using WatchableApp. #29258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add optional logging to MSBuild SDK Resolver #26904
  • Update target framework version in toolsetinfo for NET 8. #29316
  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Document for breaking changes, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublicAPI analyzer is not running #65707
    17.5
  • code generator sees wrong ISymbol when referencing shadowed nested types #65704
  • Possible Optimization: An attribute to force the generation of a jump table for a switch on integer #65703
  • Test plan for "Primary Constructors" feature #65697

Closed

  • Conversion operator clashes with the explicit impls #65685
    17.5
  • Test plan for "Primary Constructors" #57048
    17.5
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33130.290 #65692

PullRequests

Created

  • Move IDS_FeatureRefLocalsAndReturns out of the parser #65710
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch to having the IFileChangeWatcher return IDisposable tokens #65709
    Area-IDE
  • Move to using ToListAndFree in more places in the parser. #65708
    Area-Compilers
  • Turn on NRT for the parser. #65706
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch from HostWorkspaceServices to SolutionServices #65705
    Area-IDE
  • Introduce simpler pattern for managing reset points in the parser. #65702
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65699
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Move IDS_FeatureTuples checks out of the parser. #65679
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status for Primary Constructors #65698
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65700
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Project system relayering #65701
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix incorrect duplicate conversion #65686
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Merge pull request #65407 from Youssef1313/scoped-ide"" #65696
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Cleanup keyword recommender tests #65664
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65587
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65691
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Simplify and clarify code around diagnostic modes. #65689
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65695
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65694
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [Infra] Merge main to release/dev17.5 #65673
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65690
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Fix stale inline diagnostics #65571
    Area-IDE
  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - else snippet #65178
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Revert "Revert "Read required project properties from evaluation data"" #64892
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup `SyntaxNormalizerTests` #65516
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • log data for analyzers/codefixes/refactorings #65158
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #65642
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow optional and `params` parameters in synthesized delegate templates #65582
    Area-Compilers
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #65606
    Area-Compilers
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add/Remove/Update rate limits from config, reloadable #45407
  • Blazor add support for complex segments in routing #45401
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor support for default parameters in routes #45400
    8.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Add support for missing route constraints #45399
    8.0-preview1
  • QuickGrid: expose list of columns via public method or making protected #45398
    Backlog
  • Unable to restore item #45397
  • Tag helper for create link is not works when I use AddPageRoute #45408
  • [Blazor] Enable creating dynamic routes #45396
    Backlog
  • Hosting Bundle installer removes existing x64 runtime if OPT_NO_RUNTIME=1 OPT_NO_SHAREDFX=1 are used #45395
  • Graph demo component/controller in the hosted WASM project template? #45394
    .NET 8 Planning
  • `[FromRoute]` does not work when used as model property, not as action parameter. #45392
  • Analyzer to detect greater than 1 [FromBody] usage #45382

Closed

  • XAML in Blazor SERVER side #45377
  • gRPC JSON transcoding — Unable to resolve descriptor for Enum (deserialize enum from string value) #45270
  • NavigationManager.GetUriWithQueryParameter should be able to take an array of objects (or at least strings) #45402
  • Typed results (such as Created<T>) do not emit type discriminator from attribute-based polymorphic serialization introduced in .NET 7 #45357
  • CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character #45014
    8.0-preview1
  • How should I handle OIDC callbacks when responseType=none? #45351
  • SpaProxy should not inject middleware with ASPNETCORE_HOSTINGSTARTUPASSEMBLIES #45130
  • [Blazor] Add missing logging #45234
    8.0-MQ
  • Blazor Hybrid + Web #45004
    8.0-preview1
  • Thrown exception gets ignored when function is running with async/await #45393
  • OpenIdConnect in version 7.0.0 is targeting only .net core 7.0 #45370
  • .NET 8 Feature Request: Ability to scope CSS styles to a specific instance of a component #45347
  • W3C cookies only logged when other "RequestHeader" fields are logged. #45212
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor WASM net::ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #45199
  • Cannot set conventions in Asp.Versioning.Mvc #45384
  • Parameter filters not invoked in Minimal API when using WithOpenApi extension method #45307
  • Incorrect swagger.json causing application hang in Minimal API when using WithOpenApi extension method with DateTime query parameter #45305
  • Force HTTPS Redirect URIs for all Oauth flows #45374
  • Invoking AddMvcCore 2x results in a "An item with the same key has already been added. Key: exists" #44945

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Use non-localized 8.0.x links in installer #45412
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Support deserializing non-nested enum from string #45411
    area-grpc
  • [release/7.0] Use non-localized 7.0.x links in installer #45410
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization
  • [release/2.1] Use non-localized 2.1.x links in installer #45409
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 2.1.x
  • Fix Http3ConnectionEmptyBenchmark #45406
    area-runtime
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
  • Do not generate Content for request parameters in OpenAPI #45404
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Use non-localized 6.0.x links in installer #45403
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 6.0.x
  • Update CODEOWNERS #45391
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `eb74422` to `f6fabbb` #45389
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `93f08be` to `1f643f7` #45388
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3026483` to `1f643f7` #45387
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3026483` to `1f643f7` #45385
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Add support for JSON output to more commands #45383
    area-commandlinetools
  • [release/6.0] VS 17 installation #45381
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x

Merged

  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Support deserializing non-nested enum from string #45273
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `727c0ed` to `4bd499b` #45386
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • Fix CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character #45014 #45127
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Add Logging to AuthenticationService Scripts #45375
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Avoid allocations from getting JsonOptions in Minimal #45359
    Perf, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix w3c Issue with unit test #45362
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Quarantine HelloWorld #45379
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure
  • Warn the user if they're specifying protocols that won't be used #45352
    area-runtime
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22580.8 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • Update OIDC sample #45349
    area-security
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly to MVC Model Binding #45243
    blocked, area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2058090 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Route tooling: Support component routes #44656
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • Adding json output option to ListCommand #45335
    area-commandlinetools

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DumpArray uses wrong method table when dumping arrays of structs #3532

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into release/stable #3534

Merged

  • Fix dbgshim fails to decode libcoreclr.so headers from Snap install #3530

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide clustering for map pins #11811
  • WinUI: NavigationPage transitions show white window/background behind content #11809
  • WinUI: NavigationPage transitions still animate when passing `animated: false` to PushAsync/PopAsync #11808
  • Maui - ios theme colors not updating in release version #11807
  • Binding . won't work in release mode #11806
  • repro for Slider issues on Windows and macOS #9812 #11802
    Backlog
  • MAUI - Android Navigationbar BarBackgroundColor is not updating as per the Theme color specified. #11790
    Backlog
  • Setting HeightRequest programmatically not working if performed too early #11789
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Toolbar icon image not perfectly center. #11786
    Backlog
  • FlyoutPage.IsPresented=false throws InvalidOperationException: 'Can't change IsPresented when setting Default' #11785
    Backlog
  • Button.ImageSource stretch the image on Windows, respect the original image size on Android #11784
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] CollectionView Layout Padding #11782
    Backlog
  • Windows of the same application can have an "always on top" of another window (from the same application) #11778
    Backlog
  • Window glitches when dragging app between monitors with different scaling #11777
    Backlog

Closed

  • MSAL missing_entitlements with local iPhone device #11536
  • Problem Geocoding Address #11756
  • [iOS] An SSL error when sending request to server with self-signed certificate #11225
  • Ios build fails in Azure #11278
  • EvaluateJavaScriptAsync null reference if undefined returned on Android #11770
  • Can't create APK file - Error AMM000 #11682
  • .NET MAUI style problem with gradient colors - Android #11601
    Backlog
  • [BUG] Border StrokeDash is not working on Android #11659
    Backlog
  • Picker Items not showing when BindingContext is changed from null to value at runtime #11466
  • Maui FilePicker returns zero files when selecting a lot of files. #11482
  • Handler PlatformView width issue (Android) #11535

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Setup `Frame` with all of the missing `Mapper` methods #11804
  • [net7.0] Bump Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 #11799
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Possible fix for issue #10960 #11798
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Allow transparent modal pages #11795
  • [net7.0] Clean up the files in the xml-docs artifacts #11792
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Ensure that UIScrollView ContentSize is set #11791
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Clear before each Image Source change #11787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image

    area/layout 🔲
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11775
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [net7.0] Update Essentials DeviceInfo API Docs #11796
    area/docs 📓, area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.221109.1 to 1.2.221116.1 #11794

  • Add API changes doc #11768
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Notify StrokeDashPattern changes with StrokeDashArray changes #11694
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border

Updated

  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (not before) #9678
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • Only add PointerGesture if PointerOver VisualState exists #11591
    area/gestures
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AutoInclude does not respect QueryTrackingBehavior.NoTracking #29728
  • Create a List with the appropriate capacity if we know it when using ToListAsync #29727
    Backlog
  • How to capture warnings from DatabaseModelFactory #29726
  • NativeAOT/trimming compatibility for Microsoft.Data.Sqlite #29725

Closed

  • EF core 7: Reverse engineering many to many relations missing ToTable() #29729
  • Concurrency exception when trying to insert entity with datetime2(0) key #27513
  • NotMapped property attached to db column work or not depending declaration format #29615
  • Foreign key {'X'} on entity type {T} cannot have a required dependent end since it is not unique. #29640
  • Migration for IdentityUser change type of key is failing #29664
  • Different SQL Server DELETE statement in EF Core 7 surfaces SQL Server issue #29673
  • T4 template removes implicit usings #29713
  • Trouble with nested entity with no partition key and with a collection of enum values in Cosmos DB #29558
  • Issue with serialized Json Array/Lists #29677

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix missing HasForeignKey when principal key is an alternate key #29731
    Servicing-consider
  • Handle row-version columns in owned types with conversions #29730
  • [release/7.0] Use correct parameter in query based on type mapping #29724
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/7.0] Support entities with owned types in ExecuteUpdate setter property lambda #29723
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/7.0] Fix bug where a non-sproc command comes before a sproc command #29722
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Fix bug where a non-sproc command comes before a sproc command #29680

Updated

  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 2.2.1 to 2.3.1 #29462
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.2 #29694
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Scaffold [ForeignKey] and [InverseProperty] when principal key is alternate key #29449
  • [release/7.0] Fix SQL Server bulk insert edge case (#29669) #29717
    Servicing-consider
  • SQL parentheses work #27177
  • Fix to #28648 - Json/Query: translate element access of a json array #29656

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-01
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add instructions to build using Docker into VMR's README #15073
    Area-SourceBuild

Merged

  • Remove nuget source-build patch #15079
  • Use VMR instead of the tarball for Source-Build builds #15042
    Area-SourceBuild

Updated

  • Support private feeds in prep.sh #14330
    Area-SourceBuild
  • improve format of productCommits file #15036
